section-block.tg_essential-question: What do we do during the day and at night?

section-block.tg_ind-center_teacher-talk: Does the book you are reading take place during the day or night? How do you know?
What can you do at night? Pretend it is nighttime and show what you do.
How many stars do you think there are in a nighttime sky? Show 10 stars with counters.
What do you think about when see a star? Write about it.
Draw a picture of what you do at night.
What letter do you hear at the beginning of nighttime? Show me the letter.
Can you make a bed for the animals to sleep in at night?
